ceo_buyer.justification: Commenting on the completion of the Farm-in, CEO of GDM, Justin Haines, said: “Finalisation of the Definitive Agreements puts GDM squarely onto the path to produce first gold from the Challenger Gold Mine."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement is a staged farm-in. The final potential ownership is 51%, as stated: "Upon achieving first gold production within 12 months, GDM will secure a further 36% interest, bringing its total ownership in CGM to 51%."

currency.justification: The payment is specified in dollars ('$300,000') and the buyer, Great Divide Mining Ltd (GDM), is an ASX-listed company (ASX:GDM), which implies the currency is Australian Dollars.

cash_payments_raw.justification: GDM will pay $300,000 to Challenger Mines Pty Ltd, (Challenger) owner of the Challenger Gold Mine and wholly owned subsidiary of ADG, for a 15% interest in Challenger.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction involves a cash payment for an equity stake in the project's holding company. The buyer, GDM, is not issuing its own shares as part of the consideration.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The consideration is explicitly defined as a cash payment, not a combined value. Per the financial data extraction hierarchy, this field is null.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The buyer, GDM, is not issuing its own shares. It is subscribing for shares in the target's subsidiary, Challenger Mines Pty Ltd.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares of the buyer (GDM) are being issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment specified in meters was found in the documents.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: While the agreement includes an 'Exploration Commitment', no specific monetary value is attached to this commitment. The $300,000 payment is for an equity stake and plant refurbishment, not explicitly for exploration.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Additional exploration and feasibility studies to expand gold resources within the Project Area.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: One of the key terms of the agreement is an 'Exploration Commitment – Additional exploration and feasibility studies to expand gold resources within the Project Area.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No mention of a Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) was found in the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: As at February 2025, the assets of Challenger include: 17 Mining Leases and an Exploration License over approximately 70km2 covering the majority of the Adelong Goldfield;

coverage_area_unit.justification: As at February 2025, the assets of Challenger include: 17 Mining Leases and an Exploration License over approximately 70km2 covering the majority of the Adelong Goldfield;

resource_size.justification: The value is derived from the 'TOTAL PROJECT RESOURCES' line in the resource statement table, which lists: Tonnes: 1,820,000, Grade(g/t Au): 3.21, Gold (oz): 188,000. The text also states 'The Project now carries a JORC (2012) Resource of 188,000oz'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Great Divide Mining Ltd (the Company or GDM) (ASX:GDM)'.
